Package com.ultreon.craft.menu

Class ContainerMenu

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.craft.menu.ContainerMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
Inventory
public abstract class ContainerMenu extends Object
A class that holds a bunch of item slots.

  • Constructor Details

    • ContainerMenu

      protected ContainerMenu(@NotNull @NotNull MenuType<?> type, @NotNull @NotNull World world, @NotNull @NotNull Entity entity, @Nullable @Nullable BlockPos pos, int size)
      Creates a new ContainerMenu
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the menu.
      world - the world where the menu is opened in.
      entity - the entity that opened the menu.
      pos - the position where the menu is opened.
      size - the number of slots.

    • onTakeItem

      @OverrideOnly public void onTakeItem(ServerPlayer player, int index, boolean rightClick)
      onTakeItem method is called when a player takes an item from a specific slot.

      NOTE: This method is meant for override only

      Parameters:
      player - the server player who is taking the item
      index - the index of the slot from which the item is being taken
      rightClick - a boolean indicating whether the player right-clicked to take the item

      Sets the custom title of the menu.
